column4: I'll have to keep asking if anyone knows how to delete DVD rewirtable? Can anyone help???

favro: LjL: Thks but the only option in K3b is delete CD or format DVD someone suggested format, but it doesn?t delete. Its driving me crazy so I'll try to delete CD with a DVD and be back to you all. Thks meanwhile
